code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{get2025Standings,get2025UpcomingRaces}from'../utils/f1Data';import{calculatePointsDifference}from'../utils/calculations';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PointsCalculator=()=>{const[standings,setStandings]=useState([]);const[upcomingRaces,setUpcomingRaces]=useState([]);const[selectedDriver1,setSelectedDriver1]=useState('');const[selectedDriver2,setSelectedDriver2]=useState('');const[calculationResult,setCalculationResult]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const loadData=()=>{const standingsData=get2025Standings();const racesData=get2025UpcomingRaces();setStandings(standingsData);setUpcomingRaces(racesData);if(standingsData.length>1){setSelectedDriver1(standingsData[0].id);setSelectedDriver2(standingsData[1].id);}setLoading(false);};loadData();},[]);const handleCalculate=()=>{if(!selectedDriver1||!selectedDriver2)return;const result=calculatePointsDifference(selectedDriver1,selectedDriver2,standings,upcomingRaces);setCalculationResult(result);};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading 2025 data..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"points-calculator",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"2025 Championship Points Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"calculator-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"driver-selection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Current Leader:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:selectedDriver1,onChange:e=>setSelectedDriver1(e.target.value),children:standings.map(driver=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:driver.id,children:[driver.name," (",driver.team,") - ",driver.points," pts"]},driver.id))})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCalculate,className:"calculate-btn",children:"Calculate Points Needed"}),calculationResult&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"calculation-result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"2025 Championship Outlook:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:calculationResult.driver2.name})," needs to gain",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[" ",calculationResult.pointsNeeded," points"]})," on",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[" ",calculationResult.driver1.name]})," over",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[" ",calculationResult.racesLeft," races"]})," to win."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Average needed per race: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[calculationResult.avgPerRace.toFixed(1)," points"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Maximum points available: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:calculationResult.maxPossiblePoints})]})]})]})]});};export default PointsCalculator;
